recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.recipe: Cook spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook pancetta until crispy. Mix eggs, cheese, and pepper in a bowl. Combine hot spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture, stirring quickly.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.recipe: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Simmer in a sauce made of tomatoes, cream, and spices.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.recipe: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic and ginger. Stir fry vegetables. Add soy sauce and stir until vegetables are tender.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.recipe: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Serve in taco shells with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.recipe: Mix flour, milk, eggs, and baking powder. Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.recipe: Combine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Toss with Caesar dressing.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.recipe: Brown beef cubes. Add onions, carrots, and potatoes. Simmer in beef broth until tender.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.recipe: Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, and baking powder. Add eggs, milk, and oil. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.title: Guacamole
recipes.recipe: Mash avocados. Mix in lime juice, cilantro, onions, and tomatoes. Season with salt.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.recipe: Butter bread slices. Place cheese between slices. Grill until bread is golden and cheese is melted.
